body_html: @ArmenAg, as a general note, try to avoid superfluous whitespace changes when making a refactoring change like this; every extra line you touch is an extra one you might be merge conflicting with someone else. We're happy to take reformatting, but it's best if it lives in a PR of its own. (It also makes reviewing harder, because I have to scroll through a bunch of irrelevant changes to get to the substantive ones.)
